page.description: Adds a length of time (year, months, hours) to a date.

argument.name: interval
argument.description: Defines the time interval to add. It can be one of the following:

argument.name: units
argument.description: The number of *[js:interval]* to add to the date.

discussion.p: The *[js:addTime()]* is a method available for a JavaScript Date object in the Grid and UX Component.
